channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A major winter storm is pummeling the Northeast with ice and snow
item.description: A system expected to drop 6 inches of snow or more from Pennsylvania to Maine could tie up the Tuesday evening commute, the National Weather Service s...

item.title: Pope Leo wraps up his visit to Lebanon with prayers at the site of Beirut's port blast
item.description: Pope Leo XIV ended his first overseas papal trip with prayers at Beirut's devastated port and a Mass attended by 150,000 worshippers in a country desp...

item.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a technical marvel and game design nightmare
item.description: After a decade of development, Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a beautiful but befuddling game full of misguided design decisions and annoying sidekicks.

item.title: 'Franklin' publisher slams Hegseth for his post of the turtle firing on drug boats
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth faces growing scrutiny over an attack on an alleged drug boat. His response included a parody of the kids' book charact...

item.title: Trump pardons Honduran ex-president who was convicted of drug crimes

item.title: National Guard shooting suspect charged with murder, held without bond

item.title: 3 ways to borrow home equity without refinancing to know for 2026
item.description: Want to borrow your home equity without having to alter your low-rate mortgage terms in 2026? Here's how to do it.

item.title: Pope prays at Beirut port blast site on last day of Lebanon visit
item.description: Pope Leo XIV demanded justice for the more than 200 victims of the disaster, at the end of his three-day visit to Lebanon.

item.title: Trump and Hegseth provide new details on controversial boat strikes

item.title: Ukrainians in war-ravaged Donbas weigh prospects of peace deal
item.description: While many Ukrainians believe they have sacrificed too much for their country to lose territory to Russia, others are desperate for the war to end.

item.title: Lamine Yamal: The face of "new Spain"
item.description: As Spain's soccer prodigy steps into the global spotlight, he stays rooted in his multi-dimensional heritage.

item.title: Nigeria grants asylum to Guinea-Bissau presidential candidate after coup
item.description: Nigeria says it is sheltering Fernando Dias in its embassy in Bissau, citing an imminent threat to his life.

item.title: Mass killings in 2025 in the US hit the lowest level since 2006
item.description: Seventeen mass killings have occurred this year in the U.S., the lowest since 2006. Experts say this probably isn’t the start of a bigger trend.

item.title: Why is Trump threatening Venezuela's Maduro?
item.description: We look at what is behind the deployment of a large US military force to within striking distance of Venezuela.

item.title: A California family was about to cut the cake when gunfire erupted at a toddler’s birthday party
